TANISHA GHORPADE

We want to eradicate the stigma associated with reusing clothes. Sustainable fashion is for anyone who wants to appreciate and enjoy fashion in harmony with nature. By creating a respectable circular system, we aim to magnify the social and environmental benefits of pre-owned fashion.

“I’ve observed second-hand clothing is still visualized as ragged, dirty clothing. This image may have been true in the past when apparel was purchased by the customer and then disposed after rigorous use.

Your wardrobe is full of possibilities

Play your part in the fashion revolution and donate or buy from our lifestyle sales. It’s an effortless way for you to become more eco-conscious. We’ll always make sure your wardrobe is stylish, chic and fun!

#preloved

Don't be surprised, these are second-hand (or as we like to say, preloved). Here are some of our favourite looks, put together with your donations!

Let’s work together!

Our team is dedicated to empower urban India to lead sustainable lifestyles. We want to make the world a greener, better place and why not start with fashion? We’re always looking for people who believe in our vision and want to make an impact!
